Text: Subscription OfferRandall Its time to start your FREE subscription to Incentive magazine your source for solutions to your organizations motivation and performance challenges To activate your free subscription just click on the following hyperlink and complete the order form by Tuesday February rdrdaspZXUZXDUID If you cannot link directly to the web site simply cut and paste the address listed above into your web browser to your subscription Or you can print the form and fax it to Each month Incentive shares successful recognition strategies provides case studies on incentive programs and consumer promotions and introduces you to the hottest ideas in travel and merchandise awards Learn more about the hows and whys that drive topnotch employee and sales force performance and discover incentive trends Five times a year you will also receive a special supplement with indepth information focusing on travel destinations corporate gifts people performance and more Act now to begin your free subscription to this valuable resource Sincerely Mike Murrell Group Publisher PS Respond by February to activate your free subscription This message is brought to you as a valued subscriber to VNU Business Publications USA To remove your name from the list please click here UMCMFaspA
